SEARCH
Module com.oniverse.maze_runner
Package com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levelDesigner

Class MazeGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levelDesigner.MazeGenerator
public class MazeGenerator extends Object
MazeGenerator : Class that generates a maze from a MazeDesigner. The generated maze is saved in the resources/com/oniverse/neon_dystopia/mazes/player folder. The name of the generated file is playerMaze_.xml The generated file is an XML file that can be loaded by the game.
See Also:
  • LevelDesigner
  • XMLWriter

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public void generate()
      This method is used to generate the maze. The generated maze is saved in the resources/com/oniverse/neon_dystopia/mazes/player folder. The name of the generated file is playerMaze_.xml The generated file is an XML file that can be loaded by the game.
